features: 🌛【Superior Ergonomic Design】- This 10 inch Hybrid Mattress ergonomic design, Perfect fit with the human body curve, good for body shaping and relieve pressure.Give you a good night's sleep.

🌛【Perfect Comfort】Gel Memory Foam bed design combined expertise and the best materials with advanced sleep technology. Memory foam conducive to continuous airflow & breathable; skin-friendly fabrics adapt to the environment to keep the mattress surface at the ideal sleeping temperature.

🌛【Stress Relief】- Add a layered memory foam, the pocket spring mattress has excellent shock-absorption and elasticity, reduce noise. Alleviates stress of your shoulders, hips and lower back for the ultimate stress relief, Super good cost performance.

🕝【Buy Sleep】 Slecofom Sleep Mattress will vacuum pack your mattress into a box, and then ship it directly to your door for your convenience. expand to its full lofty shape inside your home. They fit all frames, such as box spring, floor, slatted base, flat platform or adjustable bed, hospital bed.NOTE: Please allow up to 72 hours for the mattress to fully expand and for any potential odors to dissipate.

💝【About Us】We are a manufacturer specializing in the production and processing of mattresses, We also have professional production and R&D teams. guarantee the best price mattress you can get. Our bed mattress come with 10 years warranty. If for any reason you are unsatisfied, contact us at any time for support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is the fourth bed-in-a-box I've purchased from Amazon over 7 years. If you are hesitant about buying a flattened and rolled up mattress online, don't be. This is by far the best one. I'm replacing my oldest one which is my second favorite. I used to sell mattresses, and this one looks and feels like it should cost about $1,500. I purchased the 12" pillow-top version. I would say it's medium firm but very comfortable. I weigh 165 lbs and sitting on the edge provides plenty of support. The mattress is very heavy and will require two people to move around and unroll. It expanded to the full 12 inch thickness in about a minute and doesn't have any odor. I certainly suggest you consider this option.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like the firmness of the mattress. Our old mattress had an uneven surface with a large hump in the middle. I'm hoping that the new one will maintain its shape. Best night sleep since replacing my old mattress. Even my husband loves the new mattress.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Amazon posting description wrong
reviews.reviewText: The mattress is nice, it expands right away to 10 in but it's soft to my standard. I purchased as it's advertised on Amazon that it's extra firm while this is just medium. Wrong advertisement. I have to return this for something real firm.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars firm yet comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I like everything about this mattress.the handles on the sides are a bonus

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far so good!
reviews.reviewText: Unboxing was a little tedious but once the plastic is off the mattress expands pretty quickly. I let it sit for about 30 hours but probably didn’t need that long. I prefer a firm mattress and this one is definitely firm and good quality for the price. I’ve only had it a week but so far so good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Got rid of my back and neck pain finally. Excellent mattress
reviews.reviewText: Bought one for my twin bed and since then I have had perfect sleep.. getting up morning feels refreshing and without any back or neck pain, which unfortunately I have been having for years.Now I am looking for the same mattress in king size but can't find it.. would be great if I could get that somehow

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am very impressed with this mattress -it rolled up and arrived tightly compressed in a strong box, and once we finally got it out of the plastic, it started puffing out immediately. I did wait for 48 hours until using as I did not want to disturb anything before it was ready. The mattress is on the firmer side, but that is a good thing. I like that this is a hybrid mattress with gel memory foam and coils. The fabric is very nice and the bed seems to be well made. So far, I am very happy with this mattress!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: You cannot beat the price, but if you don't like a firm mattress this isn't for you. It will relax after some time but overall this is not a sink your body in fill. It expands pretty well out the package and is heavy and durable. The handles made me buy it over another option, happy I did.
